thread.title: CityFleet Networks to speak at the Social Discovery Conference in London on October 14, 2015
thread.title_full: CityFleet Networks to speak at the Social Discovery Conference in London on October 14, 2015

title: CityFleet Networks to speak at the Social Discovery Conference in London on October 14, 2015
text:
CityFleet Networks to speak at the Social Discovery Conference in London on October 14, 2015 New York / NY / USA – WEBWIRE – Monday, October 05, 2015 Social Discovery Conference will be in London on October 14, 2015 
New York, NY--Ticonderoga Ventures, Inc. announces that CityFleet will speak at the SocialDiscovery.org conference on October 14, 2015 in London. 
Sean McDonagh, Group Director of Sales at City Fleet will participate on a panel covering Taxi Discovery in London. Mr. McDonagh looks after sales across the CityFleet group of companies and has over 8 years experience in the industry having also worked previously for the Mountview House Group, owners of Radio Taxis, Xeta and One Transport. Social discovery has transformed social media and ecommerce. Users joining communities based on an interest and discover new people, places and things. Social discovery related sites are experiencing higher levels of growth in user base and revenues. Some examples of social discovery sites include Reddit, SoundCloud, Pinterest and Twitter. ABOUT CITY FLEET CityFleet Networks Limited is jointly owned by two publicly listed companies, ComfortDelGro Group and Cabcharge Australia, both of which are specialist transport operations. The majority shareholder ComfortDelGro operates bus, coach, Taxi and light rail operations in the UK, Ireland, Singapore, China, Malaysia and Vietnam. Cabcharge Australia is the leading Taxi account management company in Australia processing thousands of Taxi transactions across Australia on a daily basis. 
CityFleet is the UK operation and is one of the leading suppliers to the UK corporate market with owned Taxi, Private Hire and Coach Fleets including Comcab, Comfort Executive and Westbus operating in London, Birmingham, Liverpool, Aberdeen and Edinburgh. In addition CityFleet operates a booking consolidation platform called Advantage providing clients with access to all forms of ground transport across the UK and Internationally via the internet, call centre and mobile app. ABOUT THE SOCIAL DISCOVERY CONFERENCE The Social Discovery Conference is a one day summit that assembles C-Level executives and founders from social discovery, venture capital, social media, mobile development, ecommerce, entertainment, online marketing, social networking, and others. The event covers trends, technology, business models, investment and networking. For more information, please visit the website http://SocialDiscovery.ORG or contact: Ticonderoga Ventures, Inc. Tel: USA +1 (212) 722-1744 ext 83 E-mail: info-18@socialdiscovery.org Twitter: @Social_Discover
